objective: calculate ameris bancorp's tangible book value.

tasks.task: Search for Total Shareholder Equity in Ameris Bancorp's most recent balance sheet.
Search for the value of all intangible assets in Ameris Bancorp's most recent balance sheet. Make sure to include Goodwill.
Calculate Ameris Bancorp's tangible book value by using the following formula: Tangible Book Value = Total Shareholder Equity - Intangible Assets - Goodwill.
Provide the calculated tangible book value of Ameris Bancorp.
